ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Is the subject verbal? Determines if dbaes_bnvtotal or dbaes_bvtotal should be populated.
Notes: If Yes, then dbaes_bvtotal should not be null, else dbaes_bnvtotal should not be null.

ElementDescription: In your judgment, is this child's behavior consistent with an autism spectrum diagnosis?
How certain are you of this classification?
If ASD, what is the diagnosis?
Does this child demonstrate behavior consistent with the broader autism phenotype?
Notes: 1=Social concerns (e.g., difficulties with peer relationships, social understanding) ;  2=Language/communication concerns (e.g., conversational difficulty, stereotyped language) ;  3=Atypical behaviors (e.g., rigidity, stereotyped mannerisms) ;  4=Emotional/behavioral regulation ;  5=Other

ElementDescription: Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
Before Hurricane Harvey (before August 2017) did a doctor or other health care provider ever tell you that you had any of the following? Anxiety Disorder
Before Hurricane Harvey (before August 2017) did a doctor or other health care provider ever tell you that you had any of the following? Bipolar Disorder
Before Hurricane Harvey (before August 2017) did a doctor or other health care provider ever tell you that you had any of the following? Depression
Before Hurricane Harvey (before August 2017) did a doctor or other health care provider ever tell you that you had any of the following? Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
